Text:
Nice one, cheers Dean. I did get this from somewhere else this time, but the upload is appreciated all the same. 

Is it just me or has everything gone all green around here?

Dear albiondean, 

You are a total legend. Stupid bloody iPlayer won't let anyone watch programmes outside the UK. I'm a British citizen and I'd be happy (well, maybe not happy, but willing) to pay the license fee from abroad. Silly rules - thank god for bit torrent and people like you!
